articles.title: Karnataka Election 2023 LIVE Updates: EC Refutes 'Assembly Poll EVMs Used in South Africa’ Claim of Congres - News18
articles.description: Karnataka Election 2023 LIVE Updates: The exit polls are also out, with some agencies predicting a hung Assembly in Karnataka, which is BJP's southern citadel, while others giving a slight edge to Congress with HD Kumaraswamy's Janata Dal (Secular) playing a …
articles.content: Lotus, saying the BJP would get 120 to 125 seats in the Assembly election and return to power.Stating that the party would prove the exit polls wrong, the Union Minister of State for Agriculture and … [+2448 chars]
